Q_DESC:
You are given a list of numbers. You have to perform Merge Sort on the given array. You have to print the separate sub groups that are generated during the mergeSort process. You have to print the left and right sorted sub arrays as given below in the test cases.

Input
First line contains N denoting the size of the list. The next line contains N space separated numbers in an unsorted manner.

Output
Print the left sorted sub Array followed by right sorted sub Array. You have to also print the final sorted array.
